result.eng: I would like to say something on this matter.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.html: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seoI would like to say something on this matter.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom rud éigin a rá ar an áḃar seoI would like to say something on this matter.

result.eng: I would like to say something about that.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sin
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sin
result.html: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sinI would like to say something about that.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom rud éigin a rá ina ṫaoḃ sinI would like to say something about that.

result.eng: I feel that something is not right.
result.ga: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.orig: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.html: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealachI feel that something is not right.
result.ponchtml: Braiṫim go ḃfuil rud éigin as bealaċI feel that something is not right.

result.eng: I need to discuss something with you.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé rud éigin a phlé leat
result.orig: Caithfidh mé rud éigin a phlé leat
result.html: Caithfidh mé rud éigin a phlé leatI need to discuss something with you.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé rud éigin a ṗlé leatI need to discuss something with you.

result.html: Is cúis imní éIt's something to worry about.
result.ponchtml: Is cúis imní éIt's something to worry about.

result.eng: It's a pitty something like that doesn't exist in Dublin.
result.ga: Is trua nach bhfuil a leithéid i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Is trua nach bhfuil a leithéid i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.html: Is trua nach bhfuil a leithéid i mBaile Átha CliathIt's a pitty something like that doesn't exist in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ ḃfuil a leiṫéid i mBaile Áṫa CliaṫIt's a pitty something like that doesn't exist in Dublin.

result.eng: That's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ga: Sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.orig: Sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.html: Sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ponchtml: Sin rud naċ ḃfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.

result.eng: I'm worried that something is not right.
result.ga: Tá mé buartha go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.orig: Tá mé buartha go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.html: Tá mé buartha go bhfuil rud éigin as bealachI'm worried that something is not right.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé buarṫa go ḃfuil rud éigin as bealaċI'm worried that something is not right.

result.eng: There is something wrong with this car.
result.ga: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seo
result.orig: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seo
result.html: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seoThere is something wrong with this car.
result.ponchtml: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an ċarr seoThere is something wrong with this car.

result.eng: What about buying something in Standún's Shop or in the Craft Village in An Spidéal?

result.eng: But if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.
result.ga: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht
result.orig: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht

result.ponchtml: Aċ má tá tú ag iarraiḋ geansaí le coċall a ċeannaċt le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánaċ an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireaċtBut if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.

result.eng: Do you want something to drink?

result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ólDo you want something to drink?

result.eng: I am trying to say something to you.

result.html: Tá mé ag iarraidh rud a rá leatI am trying to say something to you.

result.eng: They gave the Irish-language community something to read.

result.eng: He pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.

result.ponchtml: Ṫarraing sé air leaḃar scríoḃ dornán inti agus ḋruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.

result.eng: You will get something you didn't bargain for!
result.ga: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh air

result.eng: He has something to cry about.
